HPI 8606 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1990 Suzuka Super Touring Car 500km (JTC Round 3) Winner M. Hasemi/A. Olofsson

1990 was the year that Godzilla arrived in the All-Japan Touring Car Championship series and ended the diversity of the series. Masahiro Hasemi and Anders Olofsson qualified in 2nd place for round 3 of the JTC series in the R32 and went on to win. This was their only win of the series but they finished in 3rd & 4th place respectively due to consistent 2nd place finishes the rest of the season.









Source
1990 AJTCC - round 3
